review_title: Management out of touch with employees
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Crawley, West Sussex, South East England, England
pros:
- Great work colleagues who are always willing to help.
- Good central location within Crawley.
- Two weeks leave at Christmas on top of your statutory holiday allowance.
cons:
- Holidays can only be taken outside of term-time  (penalising anyone without children to book holidays during peak season).
- No holiday carry over.
- No investment in staff training/development.
- Lacking in up-to-date IT resources for staff to do their jobs efficiently (students are catered for).

review_title: Lots of problems, hope it gets better soon.
job_title: Lecturer in Crawley, West Sussex, South East England, England
pros: The people are great to work with.
cons: No money for anything. On going financial problems that are not likely to go away in a hurry. Lots of middle management roles abolished so career opportunities limited.
